sec.title: 摘要
sec.p: 令 B n 为 [ n ] = { 1 , 2 , ⋯ , n } 的所有子集按包含关系构成的偏序集。Sperner定理说明 B n 中最大的Sperner集族的密度为 ( n ⌈ n 2 ⌉ ) / 2 n 。本文研究Sperner定理在凸集上的推广，并证明Sperner定理在压缩滤子上成立。

sec.title: ABSTRACT
sec.p: Let [ n ] = { 1 , 2 , ⋯ , n } and B n = { A : A ⊆ [ n ] } . Sperner theorem states that the density of the largest Sperner family in B n is ( n ⌈ n 2 ⌉ ) / 2 n . Our paper focuses on the extension of Sperner theorem on convex family and proves that Sperner theorem is valid on compressed filters.
Keywords:Sperner Family, Convex Family, Ideal, Filter, Compressed Filter
